bug.short_desc: When ibus-table is active the “enter command” dialog of Gnome cannot be closed with ESC
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
See also https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1365497 for the same bug for ibus-typing-booster.
When ibus-table is active and the “enter command” dialog is opened (default key binding Alt+F2), it cannot be closed with ESC again.
For other input methods like ibus-kkc, this works.
